![XR2XtRK.gif](http://i.imgur.com/XR2XtRK.gif)

Upgraded Type-10. It has reactive armor blocks, full track protective skirting, A new turret with a lower profile face, a carrying rack in the rear of the turret, better rear armor, and new frontal armor. The suspension and wheel spacing have also been improved.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/pys4uldm0ek93r6/A%20JGSDF%20Type-10_4.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/pys4uldm0ek93r6/A%20JGSDF%20Type-10_4.craft?dl=0)
